-- TO be able to use Cosmos DB within your Serverless Sql Pool. 
-- Create Azure Cosmos DB container, Enable Analytical Storage. 
-- Then Create `Azure Synapse Link` in Cosmos DB account. 
-- THen Come to Synapse, External Data. Click on the Cosmos DB container right click select top 100. 

CREATE CREDENTIAL [synapse-cosmos-db-pl]
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE', SECRET = 'NQzDN4N6PMtMJ2pZGsdtdXSPtrfTipDCVZI0IeQZ6nCBmVwHy4iB9NCRmAzbUkgxod58vLM6pvVgACDbWOxJLA=='


SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(â€‹PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=synapse-cosmos-db-pl;Database=cosmosdb1',
                OBJECT = 'test1synapsecontainer',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'synapse-cosmos-db-pl'
) AS [test1synapsecontainer];

GO



-- Reading Complex Container
-- Link for Query from Cosmos DB:  https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/synapse-analytics/sql/query-cosmos-db-analytical-store?tabs=openrowset-key
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
    CONNECTION = 'Account=synapse-cosmos-db-pl;Database=cosmosdb1',
    OBJECT = 'test1synapsecontainer',
    SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'synapse-cosmos-db-pl'
) 
WITH (
    Location VARCHAR(100) '$.origin.Location',
    origin VARCHAR(MAX),
    Latitude FLOAT '$.origin.lat',
    id VARCHAR(100),
    name VARCHAR(100),
    details VARCHAR(MAX)
)
AS [test1synapsecontainer]
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( details )
WITH (
    size VARCHAR(10),
    amount FLOAT
) AS nested_array
